Detailed Description

A simple PID servo control implementation for actuators on the arm.

Compute the control signal for for next control cycle.

x Actual position

Control signal for next cycle.

virtual void OA6PIDControl::registerQmotorParameters (  ControlProgram *  cp  )  [virtual]
 

The following control parameters are registered with the specified QMotor control loop.

  • kp proportional gains (Vector<10>).
  • kd derivative gains (Vector<10>).
  • ki integral gains (Vector<10>).
The following log variables are also registered.
  • error position error (Vector<10>).
  • errorDot error derivative (Vector<10>).
  • errorIntegral error integral (Vector<10>).
Parameters:
cp A pointer to main qmotor control loop.

virtual int OA6PIDControl::readGlobalConfiguration (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

This function will search in the "OA6PIDControl" section of the global configuration (See Octor::setGlobalConfigurationFile() ) for the following additional constants.

  • errorDerivObserverGains - Gains for the error derivative obersver. (double[3]).
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.
